item.title: 2 "Ancient Magiks" Questions, -- please help --
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok, i need help changing Teleport names & where they tele to, i saw that on dodian it would be…

sendQuest(“Yanille Teleport”, 13037);
sendQuest(“Teleport back home”, 13038);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044);

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
To change the names etc, but on mine the first teleport is paddewwa, so i search it and the only thing in my client.java is…

if (s == “Paddewwa”){

    teleX = 3131; 
    teleY = 9912;
    addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

But this dont change the runes needed or anything, (my source is the “cleaned source V2”) PLEASE HELP.

Also if i made a command…

If command.EqualsIgnoreCase(“Ancients”)
WHAT WOULD I PUT HERE??
} (this is to make it ancient snot normal magic).

PLEASE HELP.

Thanks!!

Read full topic
